Texto: 
non-contributory
stereotactic biopsy followed by gamma knife radiation
• isointense  mass arising within the atrium of the right lateral ventricle
• mass is attached to the glomus of the choroid plexus
• mass enhances homogeneously.
• minimal edema in the periventricular white matter.
• no hydrocephalus
intraventricular meningioma
• meningioma
• choroid plexus papilloma
• ependymoma
• metastatic disease
• xanthogranuloma of the choroid plexus
71 year old woman with headache and blurred vision
